name: JFrogPublishBuildInfo
description: Publish the build-info collected in previous tasks to Artifactory.
author: JFrog

inputs.name: connectionSource
inputs.label: Service connection source
inputs.helpMarkDown: You may either use a JFrog Platform service connection, or an Artifactory Custom service connection.

inputs.name: jfrogPlatformConnection
inputs.label: JFrog Platform service connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: JFrog Platform service connection to use in the command.

inputs.name: artifactoryConnection
inputs.label: Artifactory service connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Artifactory service to use in the command.

inputs.name: buildName
inputs.label: Build name
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Build name to publish.
To use the default build name of the pipeline, set the field to '$(Build.DefinitionName)'.

inputs.name: buildNumber
inputs.label: Build number
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Build number to publish.
To use the default build number of the pipeline, set the field to '$(Build.BuildNumber)'.

inputs.name: excludeEnvVars
inputs.label: Exclude environment variables
inputs.helpMarkDown: List of case insensitive patterns in the form of value1;value2;.... Environment variables match those patterns will be excluded from the published build info.
